1.0.name: wordpress/bitmate-author-donations
1.0.description: Adds a bitcoin address field to user profiles so that authors can accept bitcoin donations via an automatically generated bitcoin donation box after their posts or anywhere on the site with the [bitmate-author-donate] shortcode.

1.1.name: wordpress/bitmate-author-donations
1.1.description: Adds a bitcoin address field to user profiles so that authors can accept bitcoin donations via an automatically generated bitcoin donation box after their posts or anywhere on the site with the [bitmate-author-donate] shortcode.
